name: jhuet/rest-doc-converter
description: Transforms a REST documentation (RAML...) to a set of matching requests and responses.

suggest.phly/http: To create Requests and Responses matching this library with PsrPhlyProvider.
suggest.symfony/http-foundation: To create Requests and Responses matching this library with Symfony2Provider.
suggest.zendframework/zend-http: To create Requests and Responses matching this library with Zend2Provider.
